pageContext.title: “O Say Can You See”: the Early Washington, D.C. Law and Family Project
pageContext.description_excerpt: "O Say Can You See": the Early Washington, D.C. Law and Family Project explores multi-generational black and white family networks in early Washington, D.C., by collecting, digitizing, making accessible, and analyzing over 4,000 case files from the D.C. court from 1808 to 1815, records of Md. courts, and related documents about these families.
pageContext.participants: Jennifer Guiliano, Kaci Nash, Kirsten Keister, Will Thomas, Trevor Muñoz
